= Roadmap for resting =


== Planned Releases ==

*Version 0.9: Targetted on September, 2011*

   * Support for Kerberos and NTLM authentication
   * Performance benchmarking of resting APIs

*Version 0.8: Targetted on August, 2011*

   * Support for OAuth v 1.0
   * Exhaustive suite of test cases for Android version

*Version 0.7: Targetted on July, 2011*

   * Support for ATOM publishing protocol
   * Create a builder for resting and add new APIs. 
   * Exhaustive suite of test cases for Java version

== Past Releases ==

*Version 0.6: June 22, 2011*

   * Support for YAML
